headline: Will Nucor's (NUE) Forecasted Q4 Slowdown Shift Its Momentum Story?
summary: Nucor Corporation recently reported third quarter 2025 financial results, revealing sales of US$8.52 billion and net income of US$607 million, both up significantly from the prior year. An interesting detail is that management has guided for lower fourth quarter earnings due to seasonal effects, fewer shipping days, and scheduled facility outages, illustrating industry volatility even after periods of strong performance. With Nucor forecasting a seasonal dip in fourth quarter earnings, we'll...
